with Diagram('diagram', show=True):
    with Cluster('Private subnet 1'):
        cloud_services = EC2('Cloud services')
        sap_app_server = EC2('SAP App Server')
        database = EC2('Database')
    with Cluster('Private subnet 2'):
        new_service = EC2('New Service')
    vpc = VPC('Virtual Private Cloud')
    cloud_services >> sap_app_server >> database
    vpc >> cloud_services
    vpc >> sap_app_server
    vpc >> database
    vpc >> new_service
